actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be established a "National Americans of African Immigrant Heritage Month" in September to celebrate the great contributions of Americans of African immigrant heritage in the United States who have enriched the history of the Nation.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Americans of African Immigrant Heritage Month should be established to celebrate the significant contributions of Americans of recent African immigrant heritage to the history of the United States.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be established a "National Americans of African Immigrant Heritage Month" in September to celebrate the great contributions of Americans of African immigrant heritage in the United States who have enriched the history of the Nation.
